abstract: Most web-based email services allow you to download copies of your messages to the computer with a stand-alone mail program.
snippet: Most web-based email services allow you to download copies of your messages to the computer with a stand-alone mail program.
lead_paragraph: Q. I thought Yahoo and Gmail messages were stored on those companies’ servers rather than on my computer. How and why do email messages get stored on the computer?

headline.main: Keep Your Email Online or Off
